languages.text: {n}The leader of the ravaged ship's crew wipes the sweat from his brow in a motion characteristic of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — not with his whole hand, but with two fingers moving from left to right and back so as not to touch his third eye by accident. This movement is the only sign of fatigue he allows himself. His posture is immaculate, shoulders wide, eyes front — as if he did not just emerge from a gruelling battle and is simply greeting you on the bridge on an uneventful day.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Предводитель команды разоренного корабля вытирает пот со лба характерным для {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигаторов{/g} жестом — не всей ладонью, а двумя пальцами слева направо и обратно, так чтоб не задеть нечаянно третий глаз. Это движение — единственный знак усталости, который он позволяет себе. Его осанка безупречна, плечи развернуты, глаза смотрят прямо — будто он не вышел только что из тяжелого боя, а встречает вас на мостике корабля в обычных обстоятельствах. {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The leader of the ravaged ship's crew wipes the sweat from his brow in a motion characteristic of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — not with his whole hand, but with two fingers moving from left to right and back so as not to touch his third eye by accident. This movement is the only sign of fatigue he allows himself. His posture is immaculate, shoulders wide, eyes front — as if he did not just emerge from a grueling battle and is simply greeting you on the bridge on an uneventful day.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}Предводитель команды разоренного корабля вытирает пот со лба характерным для {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигаторов{/g} жестом — не всей ладонью, а двумя пальцами слева направо и обратно, так чтоб не задеть нечаянно третий глаз. Это движение — единственный знак усталости, который он позволяет себе. Его осанка безупречна, плечи развернуты, глаза смотрят прямо — будто он не вышел только что из тяжелого боя, а встречает вас на мостике корабля в обычных обстоятельствах. {/n}

Это движение — единственный знак усталости, который он позволяет себе. Его осанка безупречна, плечи развернуты, глаза смотрят прямо — будто он не вышел только что из тяжелого боя, а встречает вас на мостике корабля в обычных обстоятельствах. {/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}破壊されつくした船のクルーのリーダーは、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}特有の動きで額から汗を拭った。誤って3つ目の目に触れないように、手全体ではなく2本の指で左右に拭うのだ。この動作は、彼が唯一見せることを自身に許可する疲労の表れだ。姿勢は真っすぐで肩幅は広く、目は正面を向き、過酷な戦闘から抜け出したことを微塵も見せず、何事もない日に船橋で挨拶をしているかのようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The leader of the ravaged ship's crew wipes the sweat from his brow in a motion characteristic of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — not with his whole hand, but with two fingers moving from left to right and back so as not to touch his third eye by accident. This movement is the only sign of fatigue he allows himself. His posture is immaculate, shoulders wide, eyes front — as if he did not just emerge from a gruelling battle and is simply greeting you on the bridge on an uneventful day.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}破壊されつくした船のクルーのリーダーは、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}特有の動きで額から汗を拭った。誤って3つ目の目に触れないように、手全体ではなく2本の指で左右に拭うのだ。この動作は、彼が唯一見せることを自身に許可する疲労の表れだ。姿勢は真っすぐで肩幅は広く、目は正面を向き、過酷な戦闘から抜け出したことを微塵も見せず、何事もない日に船橋で挨拶をしているかのようだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}这艘受损舰船的舰长以带有{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}特色的动作擦去了额头上的汗水。他并不是用整个手来擦汗，而是用两根手指从左到右，向后移动，以免不小心碰到他的第三只眼。他肩膀宽阔，眼睛直视前方，姿势除了有些疲惫之外毫无瑕疵，仿佛并没有刚刚经历一场艰苦的战斗，而是在平淡无奇的日子里站在舰桥上向你打招呼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The leader of the ravaged ship's crew wipes the sweat from his brow in a motion characteristic of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — not with his whole hand, but with two fingers moving from left to right and back so as not to touch his third eye by accident. This movement is the only sign of fatigue he allows himself. His posture is immaculate, shoulders wide, eyes front — as if he did not just emerge from a gruelling battle and is simply greeting you on the bridge on an uneventful day.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这艘受损舰船的船长以带有{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}特色的动作擦去了额头上的汗水。他并不是用整个手来擦汗，而是用两根手指从左到右，向后移动，以免不小心碰到他的第三只眼。他肩膀宽阔，眼睛直视前方，姿势除了有些疲惫之外毫无瑕疵，仿佛并没有刚刚经历一场艰苦的战斗，而是在平淡无奇的日子里站在舰桥上向你打招呼。{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}El líder de la tripulación de la nave destrozada se seca el sudor de la frente con un gesto típico de los {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegantes{/g}: en vez de usar la mano entera, usa dos dedos de izquierda a derecha y vuelta para no tocar por despiste su tercer ojo. Este movimiento es la única muestra de cansancio que se permite. Su postura es inmaculada: hombros enderezados y vista al frente. Parece que te está saludando en el puente un día cualquiera y no que acaba de terminar una brutal batalla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The leader of the ravaged ship's crew wipes the sweat from his brow in a motion characteristic of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — not with his whole hand, but with two fingers moving from left to right and back so as not to touch his third eye by accident. This movement is the only sign of fatigue he allows himself. His posture is immaculate, shoulders wide, eyes front — as if he did not just emerge from a gruelling battle and is simply greeting you on the bridge on an uneventful day.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El líder de la tripulación de la nave destrozada se seca el sudor de la frente con un gesto típico de los {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegantes{/g}: en vez de usar la mano entera, usa dos dedos de izquierda a derecha y vuelta para no tocar por despiste su tercer ojo. Este movimiento es la única muestra de cansancio que se permite. Su postura es inmaculada: hombros enderezados y vista al frente. Parece que te está saludando en el puente un día cualquiera y no que acaba de terminar una brutal batalla.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}Le chef d'équipage du vaisseau détruit essuie la sueur sur son front d'un geste typique des {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateurs{/g} : pas de toute sa main, mais uniquement avec deux doigts, passés de gauche à droite, puis dans l'autre sens, pour éviter de toucher par mégarde son troisième œil. Il s'agit là de l'unique signe de fatigue qu'il s'autorise. Il arbore une posture impeccable, les épaules droites et le regard assuré. Rien ne laisse imaginer qu'il sort à peine d'un épuisant combat ; il semble simplement vous saluer sur la passerelle, comme n'importe quel autre jour.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The leader of the ravaged ship's crew wipes the sweat from his brow in a motion characteristic of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — not with his whole hand, but with two fingers moving from left to right and back so as not to touch his third eye by accident. This movement is the only sign of fatigue he allows himself. His posture is immaculate, shoulders wide, eyes front — as if he did not just emerge from a gruelling battle and is simply greeting you on the bridge on an uneventful day.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le chef d'équipage du vaisseau détruit essuie la sueur sur son front d'un geste typique des {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateurs{/g} : pas de toute sa main, mais uniquement avec deux doigts, passés de gauche à droite, puis dans l'autre sens, pour éviter de toucher par mégarde son troisième œil. Il s'agit là de l'unique signe de fatigue qu'il s'autorise. Il arbore une posture impeccable, les épaules droites et le regard assuré. Rien ne laisse imaginer qu'il sort à peine d'un épuisant combat ; il semble simplement vous saluer sur la passerelle, comme n'importe quel autre jour.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}Der Anführer der Crew des verwüsteten Schiffs wischt sich mit einer für {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigatoren{/g} typischen Geste den Schweiß von der Stirn – nicht mit der ganzen Hand, sondern mit zwei Fingern in einer Wischbewegung hin und her, um nicht versehentlich das dritte Auge zu berühren. Die Bewegung ist das einzige Anzeichen von Erschöpfung, das er sich gestattet. Seine Haltung ist tadellos, Schultern gerade, Augen nach vorne – als hätte er nicht gerade eine schwere Schlacht geschlagen, sondern würde dich lediglich an einem ereignislosen Tag auf der Brücke begrüßen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The leader of the ravaged ship's crew wipes the sweat from his brow in a motion characteristic of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — not with his whole hand, but with two fingers moving from left to right and back so as not to touch his third eye by accident. This movement is the only sign of fatigue he allows himself. His posture is immaculate, shoulders wide, eyes front — as if he did not just emerge from a gruelling battle and is simply greeting you on the bridge on an uneventful day.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Anführer der Crew des verwüsteten Schiffs wischt sich mit einer für {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigatoren{/g} typischen Geste den Schweiß von der Stirn – nicht mit der ganzen Hand, sondern mit zwei Fingern in einer Wischbewegung hin und her, um nicht versehentlich das dritte Auge zu berühren. Die Bewegung ist das einzige Anzeichen von Erschöpfung, das er sich gestattet. Seine Haltung ist tadellos, Schultern gerade, Augen nach vorne – als hätte er nicht gerade eine schwere Schlacht geschlagen, sondern würde dich lediglich an einem ereignislosen Tag auf der Brücke begrüßen.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}Perişan hâldeki geminin lideri, yanlışlıkla üçüncü gözüne dokunmamak için elinin tamamı yerine iki parmağını soldan sağa, sağdan sola götürüyor ve {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacılarla{/g} özdeşleşmiş bir hareketle alnındaki teri siliyor. Bu hareket, gösterdiği tek yorgunluk emaresi. Omuzları geniş, gözleri ileride tuttuğu, dimdik bir duruşu var. Âdeta az önce ağır bir muharebeden çıkmamış da seni alelade bir günde köprüde selamlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The leader of the ravaged ship's crew wipes the sweat from his brow in a motion characteristic of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — not with his whole hand, but with two fingers moving from left to right and back so as not to touch his third eye by accident. This movement is the only sign of fatigue he allows himself. His posture is immaculate, shoulders wide, eyes front — as if he did not just emerge from a gruelling battle and is simply greeting you on the bridge on an uneventful day.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Perişan hâldeki geminin lideri, yanlışlıkla üçüncü gözüne dokunmamak için elinin tamamı yerine iki parmağını soldan sağa, sağdan sola götürüyor ve {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}larla özdeşleşmiş bir hareketle alnındaki teri siliyor. Bu hareket, gösterdiği tek yorgunluk emaresi. Omuzları geniş, gözleri ileride tuttuğu, dimdik bir duruşu var. Âdeta az önce ağır bir muharebeden çıkmamış da seni sıradan bir günde köprüde selamlıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator
